sourcesContent:
import {create} from 'zustand'

const useFavouritesStore = create((set) => ({
    favourites: [],
    addFav: (payload) => set((state) => ([state.favourites.push(payload)])),
    removeFav: (payload) => set((state) => (state.favourites.filter(char => char.id !== payload)))
}))

export default useFavouritesStore
